about_the_game:
Become a Retail Tycoon!
Try the demo version of the most exciting shopping mall management simulator! This is just a small part of the game with a limited time, but it will give you a taste of managing your own retail empire.

Build and Design Your Shopping Mall
Start from scratch and create the shopping mall of your dreams! In the demo version, you can lay the foundation of your mall, choose a design style, and customize both interior and exterior elements. Decorate the building’s facade, add lighting, greenery, and eye-catching signs to attract more visitors. Inside, organize retail spaces, place decorations, and create a welcoming atmosphere for shoppers.

Fill Your Mall with Stores and Manage Tenants
Choose tenants—from small boutiques to well-known brands—each with their own needs and budgets. In the demo version, you can test the rental mechanics, set lease rates, and monitor tenant satisfaction. But remember, time is limited, so you need to make key decisions quickly!

Attract Customers and Meet Their Needs
Your customers are the key to success! Pay attention to their preferences, adjust your mall’s offerings, and create an inviting shopping environment. In the demo, you’ll see how visitors react to your decisions, but the full range of possibilities will be available in the complete game.

Expand and Upgrade
Reinvest your profits into new areas, improvements, and services for visitors. Experiment with exterior and interior design by adding new features to increase the mall’s appeal. In the demo, you can take the first steps toward building a successful business, but the biggest decisions await you in the full version.

Test Your Skills Now!
Time is limited—experience the core mechanics and see if you have what it takes to become a retail tycoon! Are you ready for more? The full game will unlock endless possibilities!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
